original_text: On a Sabbath, while he was going through the grainfields, his disciples plucked and ate some heads of grain, rubbing them in their hands.
korean_text: 안식일에 예수께서 밀밭 사이로 지나가실새 제자들이 이삭을 잘라 손으로 비비어 먹으니

sentences.original_text: while he was going through the grainfields,
his disciples plucked and ate some heads of grain,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들이 이삭 몇 개를 뜯어 먹었는데,
